about_the_game:
This DLC is a donation intended for those who wish to provide additional support to the developer of Snail Trek. It contains no gameplay changes or additional game content, except for:

  • You may play with your characters dressed in a classic janitor uniform at any time (toggle this ability in the options menu)
  • It also adds a secret option to the Zhawk's computer rewarding you for your patronage.
